Queries.RegisterEmployee: INSERT INTO tbl_registration (EmployeeName, Mobile, Email,Password,Gender, DoB, EmployeeAge, EmployeeType,IsActive) VALUES (@EmployeeName,@Mobile,@Email,@Password,@Gender,@DoB, @EmployeeAge, @EmployeeType,@IsActive);
Queries.Login: SELECT * FROM tbl_registration WHERE (Email=@Email AND Password=@Password)
